casebody.data:
STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. HASSAN EATON Richard E. Condon, Jr., special deputy assistant public defender, in support of the petition. Carolyn K. Longstreth, assistant state’s attorney, in opposition. Decided October 25, 2000

VERTEFEUILLE, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this petition.

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
